facet_1.name: Ebb
facet_1.effects: Sets the water elemental's primary attribute to agility. Waveform attacks enemies in its path. Neither applies on-hit effects nor attack modifiers.

facet_2.name: Flow
facet_2.effects: Sets the water elemental's primary attribute to strength. Adaptive Strike stuns based on Morphling's current Strength to Agility ratio.

effects: Creates a strong illusion of the targeted enemy hero that can cast all of the affected enemy's basic abilities with Alt-Cast toggled on
Upon the Morph Replicate sub-ability cast, Morphling takes the place of the illusion, instantly destroying it with Alt-Cast toggled on
Grants the corresponding abilites acquired via Morph its ability upgrades
Morphling can shift attributes while being affected by most disables. Reduces mana cost
Grants the corresponding abilites acquired via Morph its ability upgrades

abilities.name: Accumulation
abilities.description: Morphling gains half of his attribute bonuses halfway through each level, and the second half upon level up, instead of gaining it all upon level up.
abilities.details: Checks Morphling's current experience per server tick and grants an attribute gain buff when Current EXP ≥ 0.5 × NextLevelEXP

abilities.name: Ebb
abilities.description: Sets the water elemental's primary attribute to agility.
abilities.details: Selecting the Ebb facet unlocks this ability.

abilities.name: Flow
abilities.description: Adaptive Strike stuns based on Morphling's current Strength to Agility ratio. Morphling gains bonus spell amplification based on its current agility.
abilities.details: Selecting the Flow facet unlocks this ability. Bonus spell amplification is granted as 1% bonus per 4 Agility increments.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: The water elemental's hero model has hidden innate abilities that may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Contains hidden innate abilities accessible through channeling

ability_1.name: Waveform
ability_1.details: Surges forward, damaging enemy units in Morphling's path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
ability_1.description: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

facet_effects.ebb: Waveform attacks enemies in its path with 0.5 instant attack damage factor. Neither applies on-hit effects nor attack modifiers.

technical_details: Morphling is invulnerable and untargetable while traveling
Can move over impassable terrain and trees
Can turn, attack, cast abilities, and use items during Waveform
interaction_notes: Talent stacks multiplicatively with other cooldown reduction sources

ability_2.name: Adaptive Strike
ability_2.details: Launches a surge of water at an enemy unit, dealing damage and knocking them back. The damage is based on Morphling's agility. If Morphling's agility is much higher than strength, the max agility damage factor is used. The knockback effect is based on Morphling's strength.
ability_2.description: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

facet_effects.flow: Adaptive Strike stuns based on Morphling's current Strength to Agility ratio with 0.5 to 2.4 stun duration

interaction_notes: Procs Spell Block sources upon projectile impact
Procs Spell Reflection sources upon projectile impact
Checks Morphling's current attributes upon projectile impact

ability_3.name: Attribute Shift
ability_3.details: Morphling pulls strength points and pours them into agility, and vice versa. The process is reversible.
ability_3.description: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
technical_details: Fixed current mana loss per second: 4/8/13/17
All shifted attributes persist through death
Continues to shift while toggled, even while disabled
interaction_notes: Cannot toggle while affected by disable sources (unless Shard acquired)
Shard allows toggling during Cyclone, Forced movement, Hidden, Sleep, Stun, Taunt
Cannot be toggled while Hexed, Silenced, or cannot act
Grants bonus health using setting health mechanic

ability_4.name: Morph
ability_4.details: Changes Morphling's form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Morph can be toggled between the Morph Replicate sub-ability for its duration.
ability_4.description: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
technical_details: Copies primary attribute, base attributes, facet, hero model traits, attack range-type, innate abilities, selection box
Does not copy other base stats, transformation states, inventory
interaction_notes: Considers casting on enemy clones and illusions as heroes
Casting on illusions targets the hero who owns the illusion
Cannot Morph into dead heroes or Enchanted Morphling illusions
Retains current health and mana percentages on each form
Scepter creates strong illusion with independent charges for charge-based abilities

changes: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain) is now affected by health restoration sources
Reduced base mana regeneration from 0.5 to 0
Reduced Attribute Shift stat shift per second from 5/10/15/20 to 4/8/12/16
Increased Morph Replicate cooldown from 1 to 2
Accumulation: Reduced all attributes bonus per level from 4 to 2
ADDED Flow facet: Increased strength bonus per level from 2 to 5
ADDED Ebb facet: Increased agility bonus per level from 2 to 5
REWORKED Flow: Now grants 0.25% outgoing spell damage amplification per current agility
Waveform: No longer applies 0.5 instant attack damage factor to all enemies
ADDED Ebb facet effect: Now applies 0.5 instant attack to affected enemy units
MERGED Adaptive Strike (Agility) and Adaptive Strike (Strength) to Adaptive Strike
Adaptive Strike: Now applies knockback based on agility to strength ratio
ADDED Flow facet effect: Now applies 0.5 to 2.4 stun duration
Reduced Adaptive Strike base damage from 55/65/75/85 to 25/50/75/100
Morph now keeps Morphling's current attributes while active
